bike.description: Specialized E5 aluminum, fully manipulated women's tubesets, women's fitness geometry, smooth weld, internal cable routing, integrated headset, fender/rack eyelets

Women's Body Geometry Contour, locking w/ integrated alloy bar end, open end w/ plug
Sirrus pedal, 1.5mm Varus Angle, nylon body, symmetric alloy cage, low profile bearing system, toe clip capable
Sirrus V, sealed bearings, 24h, ground races
Forged alloy, sealed mechanism, ground races, cassette, QR, 32h
